ix.util.xml
Class XMLSchemaSyntax

java.lang.Object
  ix.util.xml.XMLSyntax
      ix.util.xml.XMLSchemaSyntax

public class XMLSchemaSyntax
extends XMLSyntax

Describes the (XML) syntax of I-X data objects as an XML schema.
